Extra information about these materials 

Welcome to this Aural Skills Quiz. This quiz is designed to help reinforce your understanding of four important areas in listening and analysis. Each area has ten questions.

This Aural Skills Quiz contains several areas that can be reached directly from the Home page:

  • tonality and atonality
  • major and minor tonalities
  • primary triads
  • cadences

You can deal with the areas in any order you wish, or you may prefer to just work through individual sections.

Click Back below to return to the last page you were looking at.
